<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass assigns local frame indices to stack slots relative to one another</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and allocates additional base registers to access them when the target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// estimates they are likely to be out of range of stack pointer and frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer relative addressing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">bool LocalStackSlotImpl::runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = MF.getFrameInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = MF.getSubtarget().getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalObjectCount = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target doesn&#39;t want/need this pass, or if there are no locals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to consider, early exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocalObjectCount == 0 || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;requiresVirtualBaseRegisters(MF))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we have enough space to store the local offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LocalOffsets.resize(MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lay out the local blob.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  calculateFrameObjectOffsets(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert virtual base registers to resolve frame index references.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedBaseRegs = insertFrameReferenceRegisters(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tell MFI whether any base registers were allocated. PEI will only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to use the local block allocations from this pass if there were any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, PEI can do a bit better job of getting the alignment right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without a hole at the start since it knows the alignment of the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the start of local allocation, and this pass doesn&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a37cfdca2465d899059663518672882b0">setUseLocalStackAllocationBlock</a>(UsedBaseRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AdjustStackOffset - Helper function used to adjust the stack frame offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalStackSlotImpl::AdjustStackOffset(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrameIdx,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the alignment of this object is greater than that of the stack, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase the stack alignment to match.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalStackSlotImpl::insertFrameReferenceRegisters(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan the function&#39;s instructions looking for frame index references.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each, ask the target if it wants a virtual base register for it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on what we can tell it about where the local will end up in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack frame. If it wants one, re-use a suitable one we&#39;ve previously</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocated, or if there isn&#39;t one that fits the bill, allocate a new one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and ask the target to create a defining instruction for it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = Fn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect all of the instructions in the block that reference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a frame index. Also store the frame index referenced to ease later</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lookup. (For any insn that has more than one FI reference, we arbitrarily</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;FrameRef, 64&gt;</a> FrameReferenceInsns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Order = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;BB : Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, allocate the base register(s) within the basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where they&#39;re used, and don&#39;t try to keep them around outside</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of that. It may be beneficial to try sharing them more broadly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than that, but the increased register pressure makes that a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tricky thing to balance. Investigate if re-materializing these</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider replacing all frame index operands that reference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an object allocated in the local block.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t try this with values not in the local block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a11d6e0b1aa8f7709f0330318b2cc5f1b">isObjectPreAllocated</a>(MO.getIndex()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the frame references by local offset.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop through the frame references and allocate for them as necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ref = 0, e = FrameReferenceInsns.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); ref &lt; e ; ++ref) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Only pre-allocated locals expected!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to keep the references to the stack protector slot through frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index operands so that it gets resolved by PEI rather than this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This avoids accesses to the stack protector though virtual base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers, and forces PEI to address it using fp/sp/bp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac7c993678733273ea9d16db7ff87b2c6">hasStackProtectorIndex</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FrameIdx == MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a5ee88eb786413b2cf541122aa749392c">getStackProtectorIndex</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Considering: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> f = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands(); idx != f; ++idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FrameIdx == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(idx).getIndex())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot find FI operand&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t FrameSizeAdjust = StackGrowsDown ? MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aa306e1d00f65a9bb1030e66e9d195a69">getLocalFrameSize</a>() : 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a suitable base register available, use it; otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create a new one. Note that any offset encoded in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction itself will be taken into account by the target,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we don&#39;t have to adjust for it here when reusing a base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BaseReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a7407603b3efcdc8d4c2b76697be34528">isValid</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found a register to reuse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = FrameSizeAdjust + LocalOffset - BaseOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No previously defined register was in range, so create a new one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t InstrOffset = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getFrameIndexInstrOffset(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t CandBaseOffset = FrameSizeAdjust + LocalOffset + InstrOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;d like to avoid creating single-use virtual base registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because the FrameRefs are in sorted order, and we&#39;ve already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// processed all FrameRefs before this one, just check whether or not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the next FrameRef will be able to reuse this new register. If not,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then don&#39;t bother creating it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ref + 1 &gt;= e ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="#a1cab3409c3d6f4b4b77dfbb3bd3ac80e">lookupCandidateBaseReg</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">              &#42;FrameReferenceInsns&#91;ref + 1&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcniterativescheduler-cpp/#ad6ff3262d4ae2e34ffe43edacef3e074">getMachineInstr</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save the base offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BaseOffset = CandBaseOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tell the target to insert the instruction to initialize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the base register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            MachineBasicBlock::iterator InsertionPt = Entry-&gt;begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BaseReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;materializeFrameBaseRegister(Entry, FrameIdx, InstrOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Materialized base register at frame local offset &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; LocalOffset + InstrOffset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; into &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(BaseReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base register already includes any offset specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the instruction, so account for that so it doesn&#39;t get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applied twice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = -InstrOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumBaseRegisters;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
